item.title: Why Web3?
item.description: It’s Now. “A more elevated way to create, connect and consume: NFT x House of Peregrine.” Blockchain technology and NFTS have created new opportunities and models for creating, connecting and transacting. The idea of ownership, community and creator is evolving as quickly as the technology itself. NFTS, BLOCKCHAIN AND CRYPTOCURRENCY EXPLAINED WHY INTERNATIONAL LIFE, NFT, AND ART IS A PERFECT MARRIAGE We have an epic vision at House of Peregrine: to make living internationally more beautiful, connected and sustainable by uniting our existing global community in new and more elevated way.

item.title: Genesis
item.description: Could this be an NFT? Laser 3.14’s name is inseparable from any conversation about Amsterdam and urban art. A unique blend of poet and street artist. One day a poem appeared on the street that said: “Could this be an NFT?”; we responded: ”Want to make one together?” “Bloom where you are planted.” It always hit out of nowhere when I received this as a response. It was 2015 and I was really not coping well with what I saw was a completely bizarre acceptance of normal life in the only place I had called home and wondered if I was the only one seeing it.
